1 Preheat oven 375 degrees. 2 In medium frying pan fry bacon to soft transparent stage. 3 Drain on paper towels. 4 Line each slice around the side of each muffin cup. Ends may overlap. 5 Break egg directly in the center of each muffin cup. 12 cup muffin pan. 6 Slightly salt and pepper. 7 Cook 15 to 20 minutes. 8 Watch for whites and yolks to begin to set. 9 Take out with small spatula on a serving plate. 10 Serve with fork and knife. 11 If you want the tops to be basted,after ten minutes of cooking, baste each egg once with 1/2 teaspoon of water. 12 You can fry bacon the night before and drain and refrigerate for morning.
